mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cabinet_name AS "cabinetName", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a3.name as "province1", a4.name as "city1", a5.name as "area1", a.address AS "address", a.cabinet_status AS "cabinetStatus", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.cabinet_nos AS "cabinetNos", a.cabinet_replace_num as "cabinetReplaceNum", a.cabinet_full_num as "cabinetFullNum", a.food_password as "foodPassword", a.sys_password as "sysPassword"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a3 ON a3.id = a.province LEFT JOIN sys_area a4 ON a4.id = a.city LEFT JOIN sys_area a5 ON a5.id = a.area
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cabinet( id, cabinet_name, province, city, area, cabinet_replace_num, cabinet_full_num, address, cabinet_status, create_time, cabinet_nos, food_password, sys_password ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cabinetName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{cabinetReplaceNum}, #{cabinetFullNum}, #{address}, #{cabinetStatus}, #{createTime}, #{cabinetNos}, #{foodPassword}, #{sysPassword} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cabinet SET cabinet_name = #{cabinetName}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, cabinet_status = #{cabinetStatus}, create_time = #{createTime}, cabinet_nos = #{cabinetNos}, cabinet_replace_num=#{cabinetReplaceNum}, cabinet_full_num=#{cabinetFullNum} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select cabinetNos,GROUP_CONCAT(productName, ":", productTotal) AS province from (select order_goods.cabinet_no as cabinetNos,count(product_name) as productTotal,product_name as productName from order_goods order_goods join orders orders on order_goods.order_no=orders.order_no where order_goods.payment_time is not null and orders.order_status=1 group by order_goods.product_name) as t1;
select id AS "id", cabinet_nos as "cabinetNos", cabinet_name AS "cabinetName", address as "address" from cabinet where area=#{areaId}

select a.id AS "id", a.cabinet_name AS "cabinetName", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a.address AS "address", a.cabinet_status AS "cabinetStatus", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.cabinet_nos AS "cabinetNos", a.cabinet_replace_num as "cabinetReplaceNum", a.cabinet_full_num as "cabinetFullNum", a.food_password as "foodPassword", a.sys_password as "sysPassword" from cabinet a where a.cabinet_nos=#{cabinetNo}
select a.cabinet_nos as "cabinetNo", a.food_password as "foodPassword", a.sys_password as "sysPassword" from cabinet a where a.cabinet_nos=#{cabinetNo}
